mapper.select: SELECT LECT_FILD_NUM as lectFildNum, LECT_TOP_CATE as lectTopCate, LECT_TOP_CATE_KOR as lectTopCateKor, LECT_MID_CATE as lectMidCate, LECT_MID_CATE_KOR as lectMidCateKor, LECT_BOT_CATE as lectBotCate, LECT_BOT_CATE_KOR as lectBotCateKor, PARENT_CODE as parentCode, LEVEL as level, REG_DATE as regDate, REG_ID as regId, LECT_ICON as lectIcon FROM b_edu.t_bedu_lect_fild
